## Deploy Rapido

1. Aggiungi GitHub Secret: `FIREBASE_TOKEN_MEDICAL_UTILITY`
2. Vai su Actions â†’ "Deploy to Firebase Hosting" â†’ Run workflow
3. Verifica: https://medical-utility.web.app

**Token giÃ  generato**: Vedi `.firebase-token.txt` (locale, git ignored)
